Method for starting and ending a text (<tspan>) text graphic
Method for starting and ending page

briefdescription.para: Transform pen properties into stroke attributes.
Flag for indicating if the music font is currently used as text font.

detaileddescription.para: If used, it has to be initialized to false (e.g., in the overriden version of StartPage) and will be changed in DeviceContext::VrvTextFont. The font is included as woff2 in Commit()

briefdescription.para: Flag indicating we need a fallback font for the music Glyphs.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string gId, std::string baseClass, std::string addedClasses, bool primary=true)
memberdef.name: AppendIdAndClass

briefdescription.para: Add id, data-id and class attributes.
Append additional attributes, as given in m_svgAdditionalAttributes.
In SVG use global styling but not with mm output (for pdf generation)
Setting mm output flag (false by default)
Setting m_svgBoudingBoxes flag (false by default)
Setting m_svgViewBox flag (false by default)
Setting m_html5 flag (false by default)
Setter for indent of the SVG (default is 3, -1 for tabs)
Set the SVG to have 'raw' formatting, with no extraneous whitespace or newlines.
Removes the xlink: prefex on href attributes, necessary for some newer browsers.
Setter for an additional CSS.
Copies additional attributes of defined elements to the SVG, each string in the form "elementName@attribute" (e.g., "note@pname")
Setter for a the smufl text font option.
Copy the content of a file to the output stream.

detaileddescription.para: This is used for copying <defs> items.

memberdef.name: DrawSvgBoundingBoxRectangle

briefdescription.para: Internal method for drawing debug SVG bounding box.
Change the flag for indicating the use of the music font as text font.
Change the flag for indicating the use of the fallback music font as text font.
Include the smufl text font either embedded or linked depending on m_smuflTextFont.
Flush the data to the internal buffer.

detaileddescription.para: Adds the xml tag if necessary and the <defs> from m_smuflGlyphs

briefdescription.para: This class implements a drawing context for generating SVG files.

detaileddescription.para: The music font is embedded by incorporating ./data/[fontname]/[glyph].xml glyphs within the SVG file.
